Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a glossy dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of four lines of brown-painted Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394715) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394715)
